faq_payment_methods_description: We accept debit/credit card and PayPal.
faq_secure_description: Yes, we never have access to your information. Credit/debit card payments are processed through Stripe, a payment processor trusted by millions of businesses around the world and secured with state-of-the-art technologies. PayPal payments are processed by Patreon.
faq_money_description: The money received goes directly towards improving Giky's systems and paying hosting fees.
